uvi.description:
usb: dwc2: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.210 by commit a7182993dd8e09f96839ddc3ac54f9b37370d282. For more details please see the references link.
